version_description:
New Sid mini-game available at level 30: Oh no, Sid’s dropped his dino egg! Swim down and avoid the perils that lie beneath to reunite Sid and his precious egg!
Make room at the holiday table for 9 new animal friends, including the Holiday Iguanodon, Rapto Claus, and more.
Get cozy in special winter habitats that are covered in snow.
We’ve done some housecleaning and installed a brand-new user interface to make things more vibrant and easy to use!
Minor bug fix (Hyrax Tree is fixed too).

New Sid mini-game available at level 30: Oh no, Sid’s dropped his dino egg! Swim down and avoid the perils that lie beneath to reunite Sid and his precious egg!
Make room at the holiday table for 9 new animal friends, including the Holiday Iguanodon, Rapto Claus, and more.
Get cozy in special winter habitats that are covered in snow.
We’ve done some housecleaning and installed a brand-new user interface to make things more vibrant and easy to use!
Minor bug fix (Hyrax Tree is fixed too).

You're going to go NUTS over this new Ice Age Village update! Forget about the frosty cold; instead, gather chocolates, welcome new families, place new landmarks, and give your village a sugary heartfelt atmosphere. 

• New Seasonal Event – For a limited time, unlock new Valentine-themed animals and decorations in the Sweet Shop!
• As of level 22, play with the new Snowman Holiday Kit – the more you collect, the more it grows!
• Expand your village further with more expansions, starting at level 43!
• Various bug fixes and improvements!

You're going to go NUTS over this new Ice Age Village update! Forget about the frosty cold; instead, gather chocolates, welcome new families, place new landmarks, and give your village a sugary heartfelt atmosphere. 

• New Seasonal Event – For a limited time, unlock new Valentine-themed animals and decorations in the Sweet Shop!
• As of level 22, play with the new Snowman Holiday Kit – the more you collect, the more it grows!
• Expand your village further with more expansions, starting at level 43!
• Various bug fixes and improvements!
Various fixes
Various fixes

The most loveable VALENTINE'S EVENT is coming soon to your Village!
Collect sweet Chocolate-Covered Strawberries to get NEW ITEMS that will melt your <3!

•  NEW ANIMALS -- Bonykisses, Valentapirs, Secret Seagulls & True-Love Triceratops! They're all at home in their NEW VALENTINE'S HABITATS!

•  Steal a smooch in the NEW Secret Sweethearts FUN BUILDING!

•  Darling NEW DECORATIONS, such as the Chocolate Waterfall, Candy Apples, Rose Bushes & more!

•  Declare your love with the NEW Be My Valentine HOLIDAY KIT!

More to come with NEW MARDI GRAS & CHINESE NEW YEAR ITEMS on their way, too!

The most loveable VALENTINE'S EVENT is coming soon to your Village!

•  Declare your love with the NEW Be My Valentine HOLIDAY KIT!

More to come with NEW MARDI GRAS & CHINESE NEW YEAR ITEMS on their way, too!

An EGG-straordinary EASTER EVENT is on its way to ICE AGE VILLAGE!

• NEW ANIMALS have hatched: Say an egg-static hello to the Candysaurus, Easter Rat, Eggolosaurus, Egguanodon & Nesting Rhino!

• No need to search high and low... NEW DECORATIONS like the Easter Egg Stump, Easter Nest, Bunny and Spring Wreaths, and Easter Egg Cup are everywhere!

• Check out NEW ANIMATED FUN BUILDINGS like the Easter Egg Hunt, Easter Garden & Easter Slide that everybunny will enjoy!

• Build the best Easter Egg Basket with this season's NEW HOLIDAY KIT -- it's so big, a mammoth could fit in it!

An EGG-straordinary EASTER EVENT is on its way to ICE AGE VILLAGE!

• NEW ANIMALS have hatched: Say an egg-static hello to the Candysaurus, Easter Rat, Eggolosaurus, Egguanodon & Nesting Rhino!

• No need to search high and low... NEW DECORATIONS like the Easter Egg Stump, Easter Nest, Bunny and Spring Wreaths, and Easter Egg Cup are everywhere!

• Check out NEW ANIMATED FUN BUILDINGS like the Easter Egg Hunt, Easter Garden & Easter Slide that everybunny will enjoy!

• Build the best Easter Egg Basket with this season's NEW HOLIDAY KIT -- it's so big, a mammoth could fit in it!

•  Sid's a lazy sloth, but YOU don't have to be! Keep up with your bustling village with 150+ new Quests!

•  Check in on your Ice Age Village for new daily and community events!

•  This update also includes bug fixes and other awesome improvements!

•  Sid's a lazy sloth, but YOU don't have to be! Keep up with your bustling village with 150+ new Quests!

•  Check in on your Ice Age Village for new daily and community events!

•  This update also includes bug fixes and other awesome improvements!

Roses are red, violets are blue... We have a NEW FLOWER FESTIVAL EVENT just for you!

- For the very first time, welcome home these NEW ANIMAL FAMILIES: Camel, Walrus, Cassowary, Cherry Blossom Elk, Rosegator & more!

- Fresh-smelling NEW DECORATIONS keep your village amazing, such as the Summer Garland, Passion Flower & Titan Arum!

- Celebrate the festivities and enjoy the NEW FUN BUILDINGS, such as the Festival Float and Flower Pole!

- Build the NEW HOLIDAY KIT for your very own Secret Garden!

We've also made minor bug fixes and other super improvements!

Get your Tickets to the Circus in Ice Age Village!
Spin to win NEW ITEMS in our NEW CIRCUS EVENT!

• A parade of NEW ANIMALS are here, like the Clownosaurus, Circus Mammoth, Circus Seal & more!

• A festival of NEW DECORATIONS to applaud -- Sloth Poster, Concession Stand, Big Top & more!

• It's the thrill of a lifetime, with NEW ANIMATED FUN BUILDINGS -- Circus Cannon, Tiger Jump & Circus Tightrope!

• Build the NEW HOLIDAY KIT, the Three-Ring Tent, for the perfect sideshow venue!

• Catch a glimpse of BRAND-NEW ANIMALS: Wild Boar & Stag Moose, available for a limited time only!

Minor bug fixes and other Manny-ficent improvements, including:        
•  Fixed compatibility issues with iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus
•  Fixed compatibility issues with iOS 9.0.1 and 9.0.2
